coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VVIP members for outpatient & in-patient services. Exception: outpatient services with limits. General medical checkups require case approval.
coverage_details.special_instructions: Medication limit is equal to pre-authorization approval limit. Freestyle devices for 50 members approved by Almamoon. Chronic conditions covered. Frames covered up to optical limit. Optical coverage for all ages and all schemes. Singulair, Warts, Osteoporosis, and Local Injection (in joints) are covered. Rehabilitation Treatment, Congenital, Neonatal Care from Day 1, Physiotherapy, Hearing & Visual Aids, Vaccination & Pre-existing conditions, Artificial Limbs, Prosthesis & Medical Equipment are covered. Transportation of mortal remains SR 10,000. Organ transplant covered up to annual limit. General medical checkups for Naghi Family and selected VIP members: up to SR 5,000 per member/year on approval. MRI, Physiotherapy and Vitamin D approved whenever requested (except class C/D+/D). Dental benefit includes dental crown and implants in sub-limit. Cost of two clinics operated by Dr. Abdul Rahman Ramadan at two locations at total fees SR 10,000/month.

coverage_details.approval_preauthorization_notes: No pre-approval required for VIP members for outpatient & in-patient services, except outpatient services with limits, some specific procedures, or as otherwise noted.

General medical checkups for Naghi Family and selected VIP members: up to SR 5,000 per member/year on approval. MRI, Physiotherapy and Vitamin D approved whenever requested (except class C/D+/D). The cost of two clinics operated by Dr. Abdul Rahman Ramadan at two locations at total fees SR 10,000/month.
